H3.text: who sings the song only in my dreams. Debbie Gibson

A4.text: Atlantic Records and Debbie Gibson worked to complete her first album as a result of the good showing by the single.

A5.text: Four singles from the album reached the top five of the Hot 100 chart: 'Only in My Dreams', 'Shake Your Love', 'Out of the Blue', and the number-one hit 'Foolish Beat', followed by 'Staying Together', which performed more modestly, reaching number 22.
